channel.title: Crafting Jewelry
channel.description:
Alright, the frame for it is 4161
The frame does not display the items, but says, You need a * mould to craft *.
How do I get it to show hidden buttons? Since I'm almost positive that this is the correct frame
EDIT: Alright, I edited the frame so that I can display an amulet instead of the mould, but still can't click it...

item.title: Crafting Jewelry
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

excuse me, this is a little bit off topic but palidino, have you checked your messages?
and for the hidden buttons, i dont know, il look into it right now

Read full topic
